00051 static inline int
00052 hwloc_get_type_or_below_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type) ;
00053 static inline int
00054 hwloc_get_type_or_below_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00055 {
00056   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00057 
00058   if (depth != HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00059     return depth;
00060 
00061   /* find the highest existing level with type order >= */
00062   for(depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_PU); ; depth--)
00063     if (hwloc_compare_types(hwloc_get_depth_type(topology, depth), type) < 0)
00064       return depth+1;
00065 
00066   /* Shouldn't ever happen, as there is always a SYSTEM level with lower order and known depth.  */
00067   /* abort(); */
00068 }
00069 
00079 static inline int
00080 hwloc_get_type_or_above_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type) ;
00081 static inline int
00082 hwloc_get_type_or_above_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00083 {
00084   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00085 
00086   if (depth != HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00087     return depth;
00088 
00089   /* find the lowest existing level with type order <= */
00090   for(depth = 0; ; depth++)
00091     if (hwloc_compare_types(hwloc_get_depth_type(topology, depth), type) > 0)
00092       return depth-1;
00093 
00094   /* Shouldn't ever happen, as there is always a PU level with higher order and known depth.  */
00095   /* abort(); */
00096 }

00117 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00118 hwloc_get_root_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology) ;
00119 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00120 hwloc_get_root_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology)
00121 {
00122   return hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, 0, 0);
00123 }

00126 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00127 hwloc_get_ancestor_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology , unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t obj) ;
00128 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00129 hwloc_get_ancestor_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology , unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t obj)
00130 {
00131   hwloc_obj_t ancestor = obj;
00132   if (obj->depth < depth)
00133     return NULL;
00134   while (ancestor && ancestor->depth > depth)
00135     ancestor = ancestor->parent;
00136   return ancestor;
00137 }

00140 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00141 hwloc_get_ancestor_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_type_t type, hwloc_obj_t obj) ;
00142 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00143 hwloc_get_ancestor_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_type_t type, hwloc_obj_t obj)
00144 {
00145   hwloc_obj_t ancestor = obj->parent;
00146   while (ancestor && ancestor->type != type)
00147     ancestor = ancestor->parent;
00148   return ancestor;
00149 }

00155 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00156 hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00157 {
00158   if (!prev)
00159     return hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00160   if (prev->depth != depth)
00161     return NULL;
00162   return prev->next_cousin;
00163 }

00171 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00172 hwloc_get_next_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type,
00173                    hwloc_obj_t prev)
00174 {
00175   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00176   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00177     return NULL;
00178   return hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, prev);
00179 }

00189 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00190 hwloc_get_pu_obj_by_os_index(hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned os_index) ;
00191 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00192 hwloc_get_pu_obj_by_os_index(hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned os_index)
00193 {
00194   hwloc_obj_t obj = NULL;
00195   while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_type(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_PU, obj)) != NULL)
00196     if (obj->os_index == os_index)
00197       return obj;
00198   return NULL;
00199 }

00205 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00206 hwloc_get_next_child (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t parent, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00207 {
00208   if (!prev)
00209     return parent->first_child;
00210   if (prev->parent != parent)
00211     return NULL;
00212   return prev->next_sibling;
00213 }

00216 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00217 hwloc_get_common_ancestor_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj1, hwloc_obj_t obj2) ;
00218 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00219 hwloc_get_common_ancestor_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj1, hwloc_obj_t obj2)
00220 {
00221   /* the loop isn't so easy since intermediate ancestors may have
00222    * different depth, causing us to alternate between using obj1->parent
00223    * and obj2->parent. Also, even if at some point we find ancestors of
00224    * of the same depth, their ancestors may have different depth again.
00225    */
00226   while (obj1 != obj2) {
00227     while (obj1->depth > obj2->depth)
00228       obj1 = obj1->parent;
00229     while (obj2->depth > obj1->depth)
00230       obj2 = obj2->parent;
00231     if (obj1 != obj2 && obj1->depth == obj2->depth) {
00232       obj1 = obj1->parent;
00233       obj2 = obj2->parent;
00234     }
00235   }
00236   return obj1;
00237 }

00243 static inline int
00244 hwloc_obj_is_in_subtree (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj, hwloc_obj_t subtree_root) ;
00245 static inline int
00246 hwloc_obj_is_in_subtree (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj, hwloc_obj_t subtree_root)
00247 {
00248   return hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, subtree_root->cpuset);
00249 }

00270 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00271 hwloc_get_first_largest_obj_inside_cpuset(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set)
00272 {
00273   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology);
00274   if (!obj->cpuset || !hwloc_bitmap_intersects(obj->cpuset, set))
00275     return NULL;
00276   while (!hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set)) {
00277     /* while the object intersects without being included, look at its children */
00278     hwloc_obj_t child = NULL;
00279     while ((child = hwloc_get_next_child(topology, obj, child)) != NULL) {
00280       if (child->cpuset && hwloc_bitmap_intersects(child->cpuset, set))
00281         break;
00282     }
00283     if (!child)
00284       /* no child intersects, return their father */
00285       return obj;
00286     /* found one intersecting child, look at its children */
00287     obj = child;
00288   }
00289   /* obj is included, return it */
00290   return obj;
00291 }

00312 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00313 hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00314                                            unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00315 {
00316   hwloc_obj_t next = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, prev);
00317   if (!next || !next->cpuset)
00318     return NULL;
00319   while (next && !hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(next->cpuset, set))
00320     next = next->next_cousin;
00321   return next;
00322 }

00348 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00349 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00350                                       unsigned depth, unsigned idx) ;
00351 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00352 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00353                                       unsigned depth, unsigned idx)
00354 {
00355   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00356   unsigned count = 0;
00357   if (!obj || !obj->cpuset)
00358     return NULL;
00359   while (obj) {
00360     if (hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set)) {
00361       if (count == idx)
00362         return obj;
00363       count++;
00364     }
00365     obj = obj->next_cousin;
00366   }
00367   return NULL;
00368 }

00380 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,

00382 static inline hwloc_obj_t

00384                                      hwloc_obj_type_t type, unsigned idx)
00385 {
00386   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00387   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)

00389   return hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth, idx);

00397 static inline unsigned
00398 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00399                                          unsigned depth) ;
00400 static inline unsigned
00401 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00402                                          unsigned depth)
00403 {
00404   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00405   unsigned count = 0;
00406   if (!obj || !obj->cpuset)
00407     return 0;
00408   while (obj) {
00409     if (hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set))
00410       count++;
00411     obj = obj->next_cousin;
00412   }
00413   return count;
00414 }

00425 static inline int
00426 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00427                                         hwloc_obj_type_t type) ;
00428 static inline int
00429 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00430                                         hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00431 {
00432   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00433   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00434     return 0;
00435   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00436     return -1; /* FIXME: agregate nbobjs from different levels? */
00437   return hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth);
00438 }

00448 static inline int
00449 hwloc_get_obj_index_inside_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00450                                    hwloc_obj_t obj) ;
00451 static inline int
00452 hwloc_get_obj_index_inside_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00453                                    hwloc_obj_t obj)
00454 {
00455   int index = 0;
00456   if (!hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set))
00457     return -1;
00458   /* count how many objects are inside the cpuset on the way from us to the beginning of the level */
00459   while ((obj = obj->prev_cousin) != NULL)
00460     if (hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set))
00461       index++;
00462   return index;
00463 }

00479 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00480 hwloc_get_child_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00481                                 hwloc_obj_t parent) ;
00482 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00483 hwloc_get_child_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00484                                 hwloc_obj_t parent)
00485 {
00486   hwloc_obj_t child;
00487   if (!parent->cpuset || hwloc_bitmap_iszero(set))
00488     return NULL;
00489   child = parent->first_child;
00490   while (child) {
00491     if (child->cpuset && hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(set, child->cpuset))
00492       return child;
00493     child = child->next_sibling;
00494   }
00495   return NULL;
00496 }
00497 
00505 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00506 hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set) ;
00507 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00508 hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set)
00509 {
00510   struct hwloc_obj *current = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology);
00511   if (hwloc_bitmap_iszero(set) || !current->cpuset || !hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(set, current->cpuset))
00512     return NULL;
00513   while (1) {
00514     hwloc_obj_t child = hwloc_get_child_covering_cpuset(topology, set, current);
00515     if (!child)
00516       return current;
00517     current = child;
00518   }
00519 }

00540 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00541 hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set,
00542                                             unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00543 {
00544   hwloc_obj_t next = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, prev);
00545   if (!next || !next->cpuset)
00546     return NULL;
00547   while (next && !hwloc_bitmap_intersects(set, next->cpuset))
00548     next = next->next_cousin;
00549   return next;
00550 }

00592 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00593 hwloc_get_cache_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set) ;
00594 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00595 hwloc_get_cache_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set)
00596 {
00597   hwloc_obj_t current = hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset(topology, set);
00598   while (current) {
00599     if (current->type == HWLOC_OBJ_CACHE)
00600       return current;
00601     current = current->parent;
00602   }
00603   return NULL;
00604 }

00610 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00611 hwloc_get_shared_cache_covering_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj) ;
00612 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00613 hwloc_get_shared_cache_covering_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology , hwloc_obj_t obj)
00614 {
00615   hwloc_obj_t current = obj->parent;
00616   if (!obj->cpuset)
00617     return NULL;
00618   while (current && current->cpuset) {
00619     if (!hwloc_bitmap_isequal(current->cpuset, obj->cpuset)
00620         && current->type == HWLOC_OBJ_CACHE)
00621       return current;
00622     current = current->parent;
00623   }
00624   return NULL;
00625 }

00666 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00667 hwloc_get_obj_below_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology,
00668                              hwloc_obj_type_t type1, unsigned idx1,
00669                              hwloc_obj_type_t type2, unsigned idx2) ;
00670 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00671 hwloc_get_obj_below_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology,
00672                              hwloc_obj_type_t type1, unsigned idx1,
00673                              hwloc_obj_type_t type2, unsigned idx2)
00674 {
00675   hwloc_obj_t obj;
00676   obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_type (topology, type1, idx1);
00677   if (!obj || !obj->cpuset)
00678     return NULL;
00679   return hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type(topology, obj->cpuset, type2, idx2);
00680 }

00700 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00701 hwloc_get_obj_below_array_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, int nr, hwloc_obj_type_t *typev, unsigned *idxv) ;
00702 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00703 hwloc_get_obj_below_array_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, int nr, hwloc_obj_type_t *typev, unsigned *idxv)
00704 {
00705   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology);
00706   int i;
00707   for(i=0; i<nr; i++) {
00708     if (!obj || !obj->cpuset)
00709       return NULL;
00710     obj = hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type(topology, obj->cpuset, typev[i], idxv[i]);
00711   }
00712   return obj;
00713 }

00738 static inline void
00739 hwloc_distributev(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t *root, unsigned n_roots, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until);
00740 static inline void
00741 hwloc_distribute(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t root, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until)
00742 {
00743   unsigned i;
00744   if (!root->arity || n == 1 || root->depth >= until) {
00745     /* Got to the bottom, we can't split any more, put everything there.  */
00746     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00747       cpuset[i] = hwloc_bitmap_dup(root->cpuset);
00748     return;
00749   }
00750   hwloc_distributev(topology, root->children, root->arity, cpuset, n, until);
00751 }
00752 
00760 static inline void
00761 hwloc_distributev(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t *roots, unsigned n_roots, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until)
00762 {
00763   unsigned i;
00764   unsigned tot_weight;
00765   hwloc_cpuset_t *cpusetp = cpuset;
00766 
00767   tot_weight = 0;
00768   for (i = 0; i < n_roots; i++)
00769     if (roots[i]->cpuset)
00770       tot_weight += hwloc_bitmap_weight(roots[i]->cpuset);
00771 
00772   for (i = 0; i < n_roots && tot_weight; i++) {
00773     /* Give to roots[i] a portion proportional to its weight */
00774     unsigned weight = roots[i]->cpuset ? hwloc_bitmap_weight(roots[i]->cpuset) : 0;
00775     unsigned chunk = (n * weight + tot_weight-1) / tot_weight;
00776     hwloc_distribute(topology, roots[i], cpusetp, chunk, until);
00777     cpusetp += chunk;
00778     tot_weight -= weight;
00779     n -= chunk;
00780   }
00781 }

00789 static inline void *
00790 hwloc_alloc_membind_policy_nodeset(hwloc_topology_t topology, size_t len, hwloc_const_nodeset_t nodeset, hwloc_membind_policy_t policy, int flags)
00791 {
00792   void *p = hwloc_alloc_membind_nodeset(topology, len, nodeset, policy, flags);
00793   if (p)
00794     return p;
00795   hwloc_set_membind_nodeset(topology, nodeset, policy, flags);
00796   p = hwloc_alloc(topology, len);
00797   if (p && policy != HWLOC_MEMBIND_FIRSTTOUCH)
00798     /* Enforce the binding by touching the data */
00799     memset(p, 0, len);
00800   return p;
00801 }
00802 
00807 static inline void *
00808 hwloc_alloc_membind_policy(hwloc_topology_t topology, size_t len, hwloc_const_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_membind_policy_t policy, int flags)
00809 {
00810   void *p = hwloc_alloc_membind(topology, len, cpuset, policy, flags);
00811   if (p)
00812     return p;
00813   hwloc_set_membind(topology, cpuset, policy, flags);
00814   p = hwloc_alloc(topology, len);
00815   if (p && policy != HWLOC_MEMBIND_FIRSTTOUCH)
00816     /* Enforce the binding by touching the data */
00817     memset(p, 0, len);
00818   return p;
00819 }

00955 
00986 static inline void
00987 hwloc_cpuset_to_nodeset(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_nodeset_t nodeset)
00988 {
00989         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_NODE);
00990         hwloc_obj_t obj;
00991 
00992         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN) {
00993                  if (hwloc_bitmap_iszero(cpuset))
00994                         hwloc_bitmap_zero(nodeset);
00995                 else
00996                         /* Assume the whole system */
00997                         hwloc_bitmap_fill(nodeset);
00998                 return;
00999         }
01000 
01001         hwloc_bitmap_zero(nodeset);
01002         obj = NULL;
01003         while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(topology, cpuset, depth, obj)) != NULL)
01004                 hwloc_bitmap_set(nodeset, obj->os_index);
01005 }
01006 
01014 static inline void
01015 hwloc_cpuset_to_nodeset_strict(struct hwloc_topology *topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_nodeset_t nodeset)
01016 {
01017         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_NODE);
01018         hwloc_obj_t obj;
01019         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN )
01020                 return;
01021         hwloc_bitmap_zero(nodeset);
01022         obj = NULL;
01023         while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(topology, cpuset, depth, obj)) != NULL)
01024                 hwloc_bitmap_set(nodeset, obj->os_index);
01025 }
01026 
01035 static inline void
01036 hwloc_cpuset_from_nodeset(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_const_nodeset_t nodeset)
01037 {
01038         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_NODE);
01039         hwloc_obj_t obj;
01040 
01041         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN ) {
01042                 if (hwloc_bitmap_iszero(nodeset))
01043                         hwloc_bitmap_zero(cpuset);
01044                 else
01045                         /* Assume the whole system */
01046                         hwloc_bitmap_fill(cpuset);
01047                 return;
01048         }
01049 
01050         hwloc_bitmap_zero(cpuset);
01051         obj = NULL;
01052         while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, obj)) != NULL) {
01053                 if (hwloc_bitmap_isset(nodeset, obj->os_index))
01054                         /* no need to check obj->cpuset because objects in levels always have a cpuset */
01055                         hwloc_bitmap_or(cpuset, cpuset, obj->cpuset);
01056         }
01057 }
01058 
01066 static inline void
01067 hwloc_cpuset_from_nodeset_strict(struct hwloc_topology *topology, hwloc_cpuset_t cpuset, hwloc_const_nodeset_t nodeset)
01068 {
01069         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_NODE);
01070         hwloc_obj_t obj;
01071         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN )
01072                 return;
01073         hwloc_bitmap_zero(cpuset);
01074         obj = NULL;
01075         while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, obj)) != NULL)
01076                 if (hwloc_bitmap_isset(nodeset, obj->os_index))
01077                         /* no need to check obj->cpuset because objects in levels always have a cpuset */
01078                         hwloc_bitmap_or(cpuset, cpuset, obj->cpuset);
01079 }
01080 
01108 static inline const struct hwloc_distances_s *
01109 hwloc_get_whole_distance_matrix_by_depth(hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth)
01110 {
01111   hwloc_obj_t root = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology);
01112   unsigned i;
01113   for(i=0; i<root->distances_count; i++)
01114     if (root->distances[i]->relative_depth == depth)
01115       return root->distances[i];
01116   return NULL;
01117 }
01118 
01138 static inline const struct hwloc_distances_s *
01139 hwloc_get_whole_distance_matrix_by_type(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
01140 {
01141   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
01142   if (depth < 0)
01143     return NULL;
01144   return hwloc_get_whole_distance_matrix_by_depth(topology, depth);
01145 }
01146 
01160 static inline const struct hwloc_distances_s *
01161 hwloc_get_distance_matrix_covering_obj_by_depth(hwloc_topology_t topology,
01162                                                 hwloc_obj_t obj, unsigned depth,
01163                                                 unsigned *firstp)
01164 {
01165   while (obj && obj->cpuset) {
01166     unsigned i;
01167     for(i=0; i<obj->distances_count; i++)
01168       if (obj->distances[i]->relative_depth == depth - obj->depth) {
01169         if (!obj->distances[i]->nbobjs)
01170           continue;
01171         *firstp = hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, obj->cpuset, depth, NULL)->logical_index;
01172         return obj->distances[i];
01173       }
01174     obj = obj->parent;
01175   }
01176   return NULL;
01177 }
01178 
01190 static inline int
01191 hwloc_get_latency(hwloc_topology_t topology,
01192                    hwloc_obj_t obj1, hwloc_obj_t obj2,
01193                    float *latency, float *reverse_latency)
01194 {
01195   hwloc_obj_t ancestor;
01196   const struct hwloc_distances_s * distances;
01197   unsigned first_logical ;
01198 
01199   if (obj1->depth != obj2->depth) {
01200     errno = EINVAL;
01201     return -1;
01202   }
01203 
01204   ancestor = hwloc_get_common_ancestor_obj(topology, obj1, obj2);
01205   distances = hwloc_get_distance_matrix_covering_obj_by_depth(topology, ancestor, obj1->depth, &first_logical);
01206   if (distances && distances->latency) {
01207     const float * latency_matrix = distances->latency;
01208     unsigned nbobjs = distances->nbobjs;
01209     unsigned l1 = obj1->logical_index - first_logical;
01210     unsigned l2 = obj2->logical_index - first_logical;
01211     *latency = latency_matrix[l1*nbobjs+l2];
01212     *reverse_latency = latency_matrix[l2*nbobjs+l1];
01213     return 0;
01214   }
01215 
01216   errno = ENOSYS;
01217   return -1;
01218 }
01219 
01234 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01235 hwloc_get_non_io_ancestor_obj(hwloc_topology_t topology ,
01236                               hwloc_obj_t ioobj)
01237 {
01238   hwloc_obj_t obj = ioobj;
01239   while (obj && !obj->cpuset) {
01240     obj = obj->parent;
01241   }
01242   return obj;
01243 }

01249 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01250 hwloc_get_next_pcidev(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t prev)
01251 {
01252   return hwloc_get_next_obj_by_type(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_PCI_DEVICE, prev);
01253 }
01254 
01258 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01259 hwloc_get_pcidev_by_busid(hwloc_topology_t topology,
01260                           unsigned domain, unsigned bus, unsigned dev, unsigned func)
01261 {
01262   hwloc_obj_t obj = NULL;
01263   while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_pcidev(topology, obj)) != NULL) {
01264     if (obj->attr->pcidev.domain == domain
01265         && obj->attr->pcidev.bus == bus
01266         && obj->attr->pcidev.dev == dev
01267         && obj->attr->pcidev.func == func)
01268       return obj;
01269   }
01270   return NULL;
01271 }
01272 
01276 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01277 hwloc_get_pcidev_by_busidstring(hwloc_topology_t topology, const char *busid)
01278 {
01279   unsigned domain = 0; /* default */
01280   unsigned bus, dev, func;
01281 
01282   if (sscanf(busid, "%x:%x.%x", &bus, &dev, &func) != 3
01283       && sscanf(busid, "%x:%x:%x.%x", &domain, &bus, &dev, &func) != 4) {
01284     errno = EINVAL;
01285     return NULL;
01286   }
01287 
01288   return hwloc_get_pcidev_by_busid(topology, domain, bus, dev, func);
01289 }

01310 
01311 /* \brief Checks whether a given bridge covers a given PCI bus.
01312  */
01313 static inline int
01314 hwloc_bridge_covers_pcibus(hwloc_obj_t bridge,
01315                            unsigned domain, unsigned bus)
01316 {
01317   return bridge->type == HWLOC_OBJ_BRIDGE
01318     && bridge->attr->bridge.downstream_type == HWLOC_OBJ_BRIDGE_PCI
01319     && bridge->attr->bridge.downstream.pci.domain == domain
01320     && bridge->attr->bridge.downstream.pci.secondary_bus <= bus
01321     && bridge->attr->bridge.downstream.pci.subordinate_bus >= bus;
01322 }
01323 
01329 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01330 hwloc_get_hostbridge_by_pcibus(hwloc_topology_t topology,
01331                                unsigned domain, unsigned bus)
01332 {
01333   hwloc_obj_t obj = NULL;
01334   while ((obj = hwloc_get_next_bridge(topology, obj)) != NULL) {
01335     if (hwloc_bridge_covers_pcibus(obj, domain, bus)) {
01336       /* found bridge covering this pcibus, make sure it's a hostbridge */
01337       assert(obj->attr->bridge.upstream_type == HWLOC_OBJ_BRIDGE_HOST);
01338       assert(obj->parent->type != HWLOC_OBJ_BRIDGE);
01339       assert(obj->parent->cpuset);
01340       return obj;
01341     }
01342   }
01343   return NULL;
01344 }

00504 static inline hwloc_obj_t 00505 hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_const_cpuset_t set) 00506 { 00507 struct hwloc_obj *current = hwloc_get_root_obj(topology); 00508 if (hwloc_bitmap_iszero(set) || !current->cpuset || !hwloc_bitmap_isincluded(set, current->cpuset)) 00509 return NULL; 00710 } 00711 00735 static inline void 00736 hwloc_distributev(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t *root, unsigned n_roots, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until); 00737 static inline void 00738 hwloc_distribute(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t root, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until) 00739 { 00740 unsigned i; 00741 if (!root->arity || n == 1 || root->depth >= until) { 00742 /* Got to the bottom, we can't split any more, put everything there. */ 00743 for (i=0; i<n; i++) 00744 cpuset[i] = hwloc_bitmap_dup(root->cpuset); 00745 return; 00746 } 00747 hwloc_distributev(topology, root->children, root->arity, cpuset, n, until); 00748 } 00749 00757 static inline void 00758 hwloc_distributev(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t *roots, unsigned n_roots, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, unsigned n, unsigned until) 00759 { 00760 unsigned i; 00761 unsigned tot_weight; 00762 hwloc_cpuset_t *cpusetp = cpuset; 00763 00764 tot_weight = 0; 00765 for (i = 0; i < n_roots; i++) 00766 if (roots[i]->cpuset) 00767 tot_weight += hwloc_bitmap_weight(roots[i]->cpuset); 00768 00769 for (i = 0; i < n_roots && tot_weight; i++) { 00770 /* Give to roots[i] a portion proportional to its weight */ 00771 unsigned weight = roots[i]->cpuset ? hwloc_bitmap_weight(roots[i]->cpuset) : 0; 00772 unsigned chunk = (n * weight + tot_weight-1) / tot_weight; 00773 hwloc_distribute(topology, roots[i], cpusetp, chunk, until); 00774 cpusetp += chunk; 00775 tot_weight -= weight; 00776 n -= chunk; 00777 } 00778 } 00779 00786 static inline void * 00787 hwloc_alloc_membind_policy_nodeset(hwloc_topology_t topology, size_t len, hwloc_const_nodeset_t nodeset, hwloc_membind_policy_t policy, int flags) 00788 { 00789 void *p = hwloc_alloc_membind_nodeset(topology, len, nodeset, policy, flags);
